events.message: I ordered a jacket last week but would like to request a refund as it does not fit me properly.
The issue was categorized under 'Refund' given the customer's request for money back.
The case was assigned to customer support agent Sarah M. for further assistance.
Hello, thank you for contacting support. I'm here to help you with your refund request for the jacket.
Could you please provide your order number and confirm if the product has been returned or if you need assistance with the return process?
My order number is 123456789. I have not sent the jacket back yet and would appreciate instructions on how to return it for a refund.
I have initiated your refund request. Please use the prepaid return label sent to your email to ship the jacket back, and once received, the refund will be processed promptly.
Thank you for the clear instructions. I will return the jacket by tomorrow and appreciate the quick help with this refund.
We have received the returned jacket and processed your refund successfully. The amount should reflect in your account within 3-5 business days.
Just checking in to confirm that you received your refund and if there is anything else we can assist you with.
Yes, I have received the refund and am very satisfied with the customer service. Thank you for your assistance!
The case has been closed following the successful refund and positive customer feedback. We appreciate your business.
